body_html: I think python3-only for something as fundamental as the hybrid frontend is a non-starter. that's 25% of our users, who due to various constraints (not everything in their control) are using py2.

body: I think python3-only for something as fundamental as the hybrid frontend is a non-starter. that's 25% of our users, who due to various constraints (not everything in their control) are using py2.
